: Being black has nothing to do with his 128 broken campaign promises. I voted for Obama because I believed he was honest. The man had the House and the Senate, and instead of pushing our progressive agenda, he played chess with the GOP and lost both, the House and Senate in the mid-term elections. Why? Because young people and seniors like me were disappointed at his lack of performance. In 8 years, he did nothing for black, latinos, or seniors. He then supported rotten Hillary and the corrupt DNC, and ignored how Hillary and the DNC rigged the primaries from Sanders. Obama, just like Hillary, is a corporate pawn. If Obama was so smart and great champion of those in need, why he supported corrupt Hillary and not honest Bernie?

Thank you Tamara. I didn't know there were two types of alerts already. Unfortunately, Adam alerts are designated to a specific building, such as a mall in the above article. An Adam alert was never issued for Adam in Aurora. I read many comments over the weekend asking why they didnt issue an Amber alert. Responses were because he wasn't abducted and because issuing too many Amber alerts is that people will begin to ignore them.
